content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I find myself stressing over the ability to find a safe place to live andafford a home, whether it be a single family, townhouse or condo.
I have definitely felt this way in the past. A lot of people are experiencing stress due to so many different factors at once. Have you tried looking online?
Yes I tried but I cannot afford.
Have you tried looking online for a place you can afford? Often times, it helps to get input from local people and learn how to find affordable homes too.
